A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gets the shinto inspiration right. The universe is one big circle\, and many of the moments in this Starwars movie makes you say \"wait a second\" - we been here before - right from the Emporer showdown in Starwars 6 to the young boy looking up at the stars in Starwars 1 and to the imperial assualt in Starwars 5 - but adds new twists and takes as different characters make different choices.
